description: This file implements an authentication context provider for a React application. It manages authentication state, token storage, login/logout functions, token validation, and context propagation to child components.

methods.name: debugAuthLog
methods.description: Logs debug messages related to authentication if log level is set to debug.

methods.name: readStoredAuth
methods.description: Reads authentication tokens and remember preference from storage, validating token usability.

methods.name: writeStoredAuth
methods.description: Stores authentication tokens and remember preference into persistent or session storage accordingly.

methods.name: extractRolesFromToken
methods.description: Extracts user roles from a JWT token payload.

methods.name: extractUserFromToken
methods.description: Extracts user info (email, username, sub) from a JWT token payload.

methods.name: extractOrganizationIdFromToken
methods.description: Extracts organization ID from a JWT token payload.
